name: Chad's Hope Center
description: Chad's Hope Teen Challenge is a ministry of Adult & Teen Challenge of Kentucky that provides men with an effective and comprehensive Christian faith-based solution to life controlling drug and alcohol problems. The center offers a 12-15 month residential recovery program for men 18 and up, focusing on spiritual, mental, and physical recovery. The program is Christ-centered and dedicated to providing quality residential recovery care, believing that true change comes through a relationship with Jesus Christ. The center endeavors to help people become mentally sound, emotionally balanced, socially adjusted, physically well, and spiritually alive.
source: Verified from official website, Google Maps listing, and multiple online sources
notes: Executive Director: Forest Quillen. Assistant Director: John Finley. Program Manager: Kyle Booth. The center is part of the Adult & Teen Challenge network and offers short-term programs, restoration for graduates, and potential internships. The program focuses on moving from a self-centered paradigm to a Christ-centered paradigm for successful recovery.
